alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 10:00PM EDT until July 18 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water reaches the Maples area of Shelton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning and continue falling to 8.7 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.0 feet on 03/30/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Sun 9 pm: 12.0 Forecast: Mon 2 am 11.7 Mon 8 am 11.7 Mon 2 pm 11.4 Mon 8 pm 11.3 Tue 2 am 11.3 Tue 8 am 11.3 Tue 2 pm 10.7 Tue 8 pm 10.4 Wed 2 am 10.1 Wed 8 am 9.2 Wed 2 pm 9.0 &&
